name: Trailer Truck Driving Games 3D
description:
For heavy & grand trucker driving lover, here is new driving simulation game cargo oil tanker truck that gives you transportation duty to transport petrol, gasoline and fuel from petrol station and oil refinery factories. This tanker Truck delivery game gives you the opportunity to drive the heavy truck on city roads with huge traffic which puts you able to show your driving skills and avoid any accidents.
Tanker Transport Fuel to Gas Stations and drive heavy truck transporter with huge 18 wheel trailers. Enjoy real oil truck driving and be a transporter from refineries. With this simulation experience you will also get a chance to explore this beautiful city. The main objective of this game is to transport refined oil, high flammable gasoline safely to offroad gas station. Provide oil cargo transport to army base and and avoid heavy traffic accidents on the road.

Key Features:

Amazing 3D HD City Environment and Graphics
Challenging Transportation Missions
Heavy oil tanker trucks and trailer models.
Realistic truck simulator
